Package DAO

Class AppointmentsDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentsDaoImpl
public class AppointmentsDaoImpl extends Object
Class AppointmentsDaoImpl.java has the Create, Read, Update and Delete functionalities for the appointments table.

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()

    • getAppointment

      public static Appointments getAppointment(int selectedAppointmentID)
      Parameters:
      selectedAppointmentID - a appointment's id to search in the database appointments table
      Returns:
      appointments object with the associated appointment DB data

    • getCustomerAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getCustomerAppointments(int customerId)
      Parameters:
      customerId - a customer's id to search in the database appointments table
      Returns:
      ObservableList with the associated appointment DB data for the selected customer

    • getUserAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getUserAppointments(int userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - a user's id to search in the database appointments table
      Returns:
      ObservableList with the associated appointment DB data for the selected user
